fields.name: Vintage Stationery
fields.description: Retro flower patterns on the paper, looks beautiful and elegant. Each package includes 3 different styles of stationery paper, 10 sheets per flower pattern, total 30 sheets; With matching envelopes, 5 pcs per pattern, total 15 pcs envelopes.

fields.name: Watercolor Birds Stationery Set (Boxed Stationery)
fields.description: Enjoy the fine art of letter-writing and make someone's day extra-special by using this cheery boxed stationery! Exuberant Watercolor Birds will add flair to your personal correspondence. Board box with clear acetate lid contains 30 sheets and 24 matching envelopes.

fields.name: Koala Bear Stationary Paper
fields.description: Great for letter writing, calligraphy, invitations, poetry, postcards, journalist and so much more. 50 Sheets 100 Pages.
